name: 3D Data Visualizer
description:
Unfortunately, the WebGL build for this game is completely broken. I don't know what Unity's problem is, since it works perfectly in the Unity editor and on Windows.  Here are the ways you can check this out.

1. I posted a youtube video demo:

2. I have uploaded a zip file of the Windows build here.

3. You can clone the repo on github and play or build it in the Unity editor: https://github.com/marcus-elia/3d-data-explorer

4. If you really want to see, here is the WebGL build that is very broken: 3D Data Visualizer - Unity Play

Explanation of the Project

This is made to visualize 3D data.  With a 2D set of data, you can just write it on a piece of paper and examine it.  But with 3D data, you would need to stack pieces of paper on top of each other.  I made this program to solve that problem.  I hope that in the future, this type of data visualization can be done through holograms, rather than on a computer screen.

It is frustrating to work hard on this, and not be able to share it because of WebGL. If anyone has any ideas to make it easier to distribute, let me know.
